title: mayilApuriyil
sahitya:
mayilApuriyil vanda mahAdEvan malaraDi vaNangip-pUjippAi manamE


anupallavi

  shailEndiran pudalvi shrI kalpakAmbikai
tavattil magizhndha nAdi shivanE kapAliyAga


caraNam    bandha vinaigaL maraiyum cintaik-kalakkam kuraiyum
saubhAgyam niraindu pongum ArOgyam meyyil ilangum 
antam AdiyumillA arutjyOti vaDivAna
jayan tannai maravA meyyanbuDan ennALum
